body.section: Hierarchy TubefeedingRequest is a kind of DieteticsRequest(Abstract)

section.title: Description
section.p: A record of a tubefeeding requested for a patient.

stentry.p: The number of kilocalories contained in this product as prepared.
The volume (in cubic centimeters) of the product contained in the order for a day.
The total kilocalories per day requested to be provided by the tubefeeding.
The total daily cc's requested to be administered of the prepared (diluted) product.
The volume (in cubic centimeters) of water with which to dilute the product if indicated.
The tubefeeding product that is requested as part of an order.
